comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This has a ghost image of the adjacent photo 'Hill_00027' visible, but as mirror-image suggesting 'face-to-face' contact during storage. Both by the San Francisco photographer J.D.GIVENS and including a distinctive 'Oriental-style' pavilion. James D Givens mentioned here www.greenspun.com/bboard/q-and-a-fetch-msg.tcl?msg_id=006tYU Could it be at the Pavilion of Siam, built 1915? webbie1.sfpl.org/multimedia/sfphotos/aad-6827.jpg blog.americanhistory.si.edu/osaycanyousee/2011/02/1915-sa...
